test_cases.description: Verifies that the list endpoint returns all existing todos with their current fields.
test_cases.name: List all todos - positive

test_setup.given: Multiple todos exist in the backend (with various field combinations).

test_cases.description: Ensures that the get endpoint returns the full todo record for a valid ID.
test_cases.name: Get todo by valid ID

test_cases.description: Ensures proper error when requesting a todo with a nonexistent ID.
test_cases.name: Get todo by invalid/nonexistent ID

test_cases.description: Verifies that a todo can be created with only the required title field.
test_cases.name: Create todo with only required field

test_cases.description: Verifies that a todo can be created with all optional fields provided.
test_cases.name: Create todo with all fields

test_setup.when: todoApi.create({"title": "Plan trip", "description": "Book flights", "notes": "Check passport", "expiry_date": "2025-01-15"}) is called.

test_cases.description: Ensures that creating a todo without a title returns an error.
test_cases.name: Create todo missing required title

test_cases.description: Ensures that creating a todo with an empty title returns an error.
test_cases.name: Create todo with empty title

test_cases.description: Ensures that creation fails if expiry_date is not in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.
test_cases.name: Create todo with invalid expiry_date format

test_cases.description: Verifies that providing null for optional fields is accepted and stored as null.
test_cases.name: Create todo with null optional fields

test_setup.when: todoApi.create({"title": "Test nulls", "description": null, "notes": null, "expiry_date": null}) is called.

test_cases.description: Verifies that updating any combination of fields works and only specified fields are changed.
test_cases.name: Update todo with some fields

test_setup.given: A todo with id 'xyz1' and fields: title='Old', description='Desc', notes='Note', expiry_date=null.

test_cases.description: Ensures that updating only the title works and other fields remain unchanged.
test_cases.name: Update todo title only

test_setup.given: A todo with id 'xyz2' and fields: title='Old Title', description='Desc', notes=null, expiry_date='2025-01-01'.

test_cases.description: Ensures that updating expiry_date with an invalid format returns an error.
test_cases.name: Update todo with invalid expiry_date

test_cases.description: Ensures that updating a nonexistent todo returns an error.
test_cases.name: Update todo with nonexistent ID

test_cases.description: Verifies that a todo can be deleted and is no longer accessible via list/get.
test_cases.name: Delete existing todo

test_cases.description: Ensures that deleting a nonexistent todo returns an error.
test_cases.name: Delete todo with nonexistent ID

test_cases.description: Ensures that a deleted todo does not appear in the list endpoint.
test_cases.name: List after deletion

test_setup.given: A todo with id 'willdelete' exists and is then deleted.

test_cases.description: Ensures that a deleted todo is no longer accessible via get endpoint.
test_cases.name: Get after deletion

test_setup.given: A todo with id 'del2' exists and is then deleted.

test_cases.description: Verifies that a todo can be created with a long title (edge of allowed length, e.g., 255 chars).
test_cases.name: Create todo with long title

test_cases.description: Ensures that updating optional fields to null is accepted.
test_cases.name: Update all optional fields to null

test_setup.given: A todo with id 'nulltest' exists with non-null description, notes, expiry_date.
test_setup.when: todoApi.update('nulltest', {"description": null, "notes": null, "expiry_date": null}) is called.

test_cases.description: On component mount, the todos are fetched via todoApi.list() and rendered in the UI as a list with all fields displayed.
test_cases.name: List todos on mount

test_setup.given: No todos initially in state; todoApi.list() returns [{id: 1, title: 'Buy milk', description: 'Grocery', notes: null, expiry_date: '2024-07-01'}]
test_setup.then: List displays a single todo with title 'Buy milk', description 'Grocery', notes empty, expiry_date '2024-07-01', and shows edit & delete buttons

test_cases.description: Submitting the 'New todo' form with valid title, description, notes, and expiry_date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format creates a new todo and displays it in the list.
test_cases.name: Create todo with all fields successfully

test_setup.given: App running with empty todo list
test_setup.then: Todo is created, list now includes new todo with all provided fields visible
test_setup.when: User clicks 'New todo', fills title: 'Task', description: 'My desc', notes: 'Important', expiry_date: '2024-08-15', and submits

test_cases.description: Submitting the 'New todo' form with only the required title field creates a new todo with other fields null/absent.
test_cases.name: Create todo with only title (required field)

test_setup.given: App running with empty todo list
test_setup.then: Todo is created, list includes todo with title 'Read book', description/notes/expiry_date are empty or not rendered
test_setup.when: User clicks 'New todo', fills title: 'Read book', leaves other fields empty, and submits

test_cases.description: Attempting to create a todo without entering a title results in an error and no API call is made.
test_cases.name: Fail to create todo with missing title

test_setup.given: App running, user opens 'New todo' form
test_setup.then: Form shows validation error indicating title is required, no todo is created, no API call is made
test_setup.when: User leaves title blank and submits

test_cases.description: Attempting to create a todo with an empty string as the title results in an error and no API call is made.
test_cases.name: Fail to create todo with empty title

test_setup.given: App running, user opens 'New todo' form
test_setup.then: Form shows validation error for title, todo is not created
test_setup.when: User enters only whitespace or empty string for title and submits

test_cases.description: Submitting the form with an expiry_date not matching 'YYYY-MM-DD' returns a validation error and does not create the todo.
test_cases.name: Fail to create todo with invalid expiry_date format

test_setup.given: App running, user opens 'New todo' form
test_setup.then: Form shows validation error for expiry_date format, todo is not created
test_setup.when: User enters title: 'Test', expiry_date: '15/07/2024', and submits

test_cases.description: Editing an existing todo with valid values updates only the provided fields and reflects changes in the UI.
test_cases.name: Edit todo successfully

test_setup.given: App displays a todo with id:1, title: 'Old title', description: 'desc', notes: '', expiry_date: '2024-07-01'
test_setup.then: Todo with id:1 is updated to have title 'New title', other fields remain unchanged in UI
test_setup.when: User clicks edit, changes title to 'New title', leaves other fields unchanged, submits form

test_cases.description: Updating only a subset of fields (e.g., notes) leaves unspecified fields unchanged.
test_cases.name: Edit only some fields of a todo

test_setup.given: Todo with id:2, title: 'Laundry', description: 'clothes', notes: null, expiry_date: null
test_setup.then: Todo with id:2 now shows notes: 'Use gentle cycle', other fields unchanged
test_setup.when: User clicks edit, adds notes: 'Use gentle cycle', submits

test_cases.description: Trying to update a todo's expiry_date to an invalid format is rejected and shows an error, no update occurs.
test_cases.name: Fail to edit todo with invalid expiry_date format

test_setup.given: Todo with id:3, title: 'Submit report', expiry_date: '2024-09-01'
test_setup.then: Form shows validation error, todo is not updated
test_setup.when: User clicks edit, sets expiry_date: '1st Sep 2024', submits form

test_cases.description: Attempting to update a todo to have an empty title is rejected and shows an error.
test_cases.name: Fail to edit todo by removing title

test_setup.then: Form shows validation error for title, todo is not updated
test_setup.when: User clicks edit, clears title field, submits form

test_cases.description: Deleting a todo after confirmation removes it from the list and ensures it's not accessible via get or list.
test_cases.name: Delete todo successfully

test_setup.given: App displays todos with id:5 and id:6
test_setup.then: Todo id:5 is removed from UI, only id:6 remains, repeated fetch/list does not include id:5
test_setup.when: User clicks delete on todo id:5 and confirms

test_cases.description: Attempting to delete a todo that no longer exists returns an error and does not alter the list.
test_cases.name: Fail to delete a nonexistent todo

test_setup.given: App displays todo with id:7; todoApi.delete(id:7) returns an error (not found)
test_setup.then: UI shows error message, todo remains in list
test_setup.when: User clicks delete on todo id:7 and confirms, but backend returns error

test_cases.description: Selecting a todo fetches and displays its full details, including all fields.
test_cases.name: View details of a todo

test_setup.given: List displays todos; get endpoint returns full record for id:8
test_setup.then: Full todo details (title, description, notes, expiry_date) are rendered
test_setup.when: User selects todo id:8 for details

test_cases.description: Fetching details for a todo with an invalid id returns an error and UI displays appropriate feedback.
test_cases.name: Fail to get a nonexistent todo

test_setup.then: UI displays error: 'Todo not found'
test_setup.when: User tries to view details for id:999

test_cases.description: Submitting the 'New todo' form without expiry_date does not cause an error and the todo is created with expiry_date null.
test_cases.name: expiry_date is optional on create

test_setup.given: App running, user opens 'New todo' form
test_setup.then: Todo is created and expiry_date field is empty or null in UI
test_setup.when: User provides title: 'No deadline', leaves expiry_date blank, submits

test_cases.description: Creating a todo with long but valid title, description, and notes fields is accepted and rendered properly.
test_cases.name: Create todo with maximum reasonable length fields

test_setup.then: Todo is created and all long field values are rendered correctly in the UI
test_setup.when: User creates todo with title of length 255, description and notes of similar length, valid expiry_date

test_cases.description: When multiple todos exist, all are rendered in the list in the order provided by the API.
test_cases.name: Multiple todos are listed in order

test_setup.given: todoApi.list() returns 3 todos with varying fields
test_setup.then: All three todos are rendered in the order returned by API

test_cases.description: User can dismiss the creation or edit form without saving, and no API call is made.
test_cases.name: User can cancel todo creation or editing

test_setup.given: User is in the process of creating or editing a todo
test_setup.then: Form is closed, no API call is made, UI returns to previous state

test_cases.description: If the user cancels the delete confirmation, the todo remains in the list.
test_cases.name: Cancelling delete does not remove todo

test_setup.then: Todo id:10 remains in the list
test_setup.when: User clicks delete but cancels confirmation dialog

test_cases.description: User creates a todo with valid title, description, notes, and correctly formatted expiry_date. Form submits successfully.
test_cases.name: Create todo with all valid fields

test_setup.given: TodoForm rendered with empty fields and onSave handler mock
test_setup.then: onSave is called with all entered values; no error is shown
test_setup.when: User enters 'Buy groceries' as title, 'Weekly shopping' as description, 'Remember to use coupons' as notes, and '2024-07-01' as expiry_date, then submits the form

test_cases.description: User creates a todo with only the required title; all other fields are left blank.
test_cases.name: Create todo with only required title

test_setup.given: TodoForm rendered with empty fields and onSave handler mock
test_setup.then: onSave is called with title, description, notes, and expiry_date as null or undefined; no error is shown
test_setup.when: User enters 'Call mom' as title, leaves description, notes, and expiry_date blank, then submits the form

test_cases.description: User attempts to create a todo without entering a title; form submission should fail and show an error.
test_cases.name: Create todo missing required title

test_setup.given: TodoForm rendered with empty fields and onSave handler mock
test_setup.then: Error message shown indicating title is required; onSave is not called
test_setup.when: User leaves title blank, enters any values in other fields, and submits the form

test_cases.description: User enters spaces in the title input; form submission should treat as empty and show error.
test_cases.name: Create todo with title as only spaces

test_setup.given: TodoForm rendered with empty fields and onSave handler mock
test_setup.then: Error message shown indicating title is required; onSave is not called
test_setup.when: User enters '   ' (spaces) in the title input and submits the form

test_cases.description: User enters an expiry_date not matching 'YYYY-MM-DD'; form submission should fail with an error.
test_cases.name: Create todo with invalid expiry_date format

test_setup.given: TodoForm rendered with title and other fields filled
test_setup.then: Error message shown indicating expiry_date format is invalid; onSave is not called
test_setup.when: User enters 'Buy milk' as title and '07/01/2024' as expiry_date, then submits the form

test_cases.description: User leaves expiry_date blank; form should accept this as optional.
test_cases.name: Create todo with empty expiry_date field

test_setup.given: TodoForm rendered with empty fields and onSave handler mock
test_setup.then: onSave is called with expiry_date as null or undefined; no error is shown
test_setup.when: User enters 'Finish report' as title, leaves expiry_date blank, and submits the form

test_cases.description: User edits an existing todo, changes only notes and expiry_date fields, and submits.
test_cases.name: Update todo with some fields changed

test_setup.given: TodoForm rendered with existing todo values, onSave handler mock
test_setup.then: onSave is called with updated notes and expiry_date; unchanged fields retain previous values
test_setup.when: User changes notes to 'Updated notes' and expiry_date to '2024-07-10', keeps other fields unchanged, and submits

test_cases.description: User attempts to set expiry_date to an invalid format during update; form should show error.
test_cases.name: Update todo with invalid expiry_date format

test_setup.given: TodoForm rendered with existing todo values, onSave handler mock
test_setup.then: Error message shown indicating expiry_date format is invalid; onSave is not called
test_setup.when: User enters '2024-7-10' as expiry_date (missing leading zero), and submits

test_cases.description: User clears description, notes, and expiry_date fields on update; form should submit with null/undefined values.
test_cases.name: Update todo to remove optional fields

test_setup.given: TodoForm rendered with existing todo values, onSave handler mock
test_setup.then: onSave is called with title unchanged, description, notes, and expiry_date as null or undefined
test_setup.when: User clears description, notes, and expiry_date fields, and submits

test_cases.description: Form renders with all input fields and correct labels for title, description, notes, and expiry_date.
test_cases.name: Render form fields and labels correctly

test_setup.then: All fields and labels are visible and accessible for user input

test_cases.description: Submit button is disabled until a valid title is entered.
test_cases.name: Submit button disabled when no title

test_setup.then: Submit button is disabled or form cannot be submitted

test_cases.description: User enters very long text in notes and description fields; form should accept or reject based on field constraints.
test_cases.name: Handle max length for notes and description fields

test_setup.then: onSave is called with long notes and description values if no max length constraint; or error shown if max length exceeded
test_setup.when: User enters 'T.repeat(1000)' in notes and description, enters valid title and expiry_date, submits form

test_cases.description: User enters expiry_date as '2024-02-29' (valid leap day); form should accept and submit.
test_cases.name: Create todo with valid leap year expiry_date

test_setup.then: onSave is called with expiry_date as '2024-02-29'; no error is shown
test_setup.when: User enters valid title and expiry_date as '2024-02-29', submits form

test_cases.description: User enters expiry_date with invalid month ('2024-13-01') or day ('2024-01-32'); form should reject input.
test_cases.name: Create todo with invalid expiry_date month or day

test_setup.then: Error message shown indicating invalid expiry_date; onSave is not called
test_setup.when: User enters valid title and expiry_date as '2024-13-01' or '2024-01-32', submits form

test_cases.description: Ensure the /todos endpoint returns an empty list when the database contains no todo items.
test_cases.name: GET /todos returns empty list when no todos exist

test_setup.given: Database is empty; no todo items exist.
test_setup.then: The response is a 200 status and an empty 'todos' array.
test_setup.when: A GET request is sent to /todos.

test_cases.description: Ensure /todos returns the created todo with all specified fields.
test_cases.name: GET /todos returns a single todo with all fields

test_setup.given: A todo item exists with all fields set.
test_setup.then: The response contains the todo item with correct field values.
test_setup.when: A GET request is sent to /todos.

test_cases.description: Verify /todos returns all existing todo items with their fields.
test_cases.name: GET /todos returns multiple todo items

test_setup.given: Two todo items exist: one with all fields, one with only required fields.
test_setup.then: Response contains both items with their field values, including nulls for optional fields.

test_cases.description: Test that todos missing optional fields return null or the fields are absent.
test_cases.name: GET /todos returns todos with absent optional fields

test_setup.given: One todo exists with only the title field set.
test_setup.then: Response contains the todo with null values for optional fields.

test_cases.description: Ensure expiry_date is always returned in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format if set.
test_cases.name: GET /todos returns expiry_date in correct format

test_setup.given: A todo exists with expiry_date set in correct format.
test_setup.then: expiry_date is returned in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

test_cases.description: Verify that the endpoint handles a large number of todos and returns all items.
test_cases.name: GET /todos supports large number of todos

response_body_json.todos: Array of 1000 todo objects, each with valid fields

test_setup.then: All 1000 todos are returned in a single response.

test_cases.description: Ensure the endpoint returns an error for unsupported HTTP methods.
test_cases.name: GET /todos with incorrect HTTP method

test_setup.then: A 405 Method Not Allowed error is returned.
test_setup.when: A POST request is sent to /todos (which is only for GET).

test_cases.description: Check behavior when Content-Type header is omitted.
test_cases.name: GET /todos without Content-Type header

test_setup.then: Returns 200 OK and empty list; Content-Type header is not strictly required for GET.
test_setup.when: GET /todos is called without Content-Type header.

test_cases.description: Ensure todos with special characters in fields are returned correctly.
test_cases.name: GET /todos returns todos with special characters

test_setup.given: A todo exists with special characters in fields.
test_setup.then: Special characters are returned correctly in response.

test_cases.description: Verify todos with maximum length values are returned correctly.
test_cases.name: GET /todos returns todos with maximum field lengths

test_setup.given: A todo exists with maximum allowed length for each field.
test_setup.then: Field values are returned without truncation or error.

test_cases.description: Ensure a deleted todo is no longer returned in the /todos list.
test_cases.name: GET /todos does not return deleted todo

test_setup.given: Two todos exist; one is deleted.
test_setup.then: Deleted todo is absent; only active todos are returned.
test_setup.when: GET /todos is called after deleting one todo.

test_cases.description: Retrieve a todo using a valid existing ID. Should return all fields of the todo.
test_cases.name: Get Existing Todo by Valid ID

test_setup.given: A todo with id=1 exists with all fields populated.
test_setup.then: Returns todo with correct field values.

test_cases.description: Retrieve a todo where optional fields (description, notes, expiry_date) are null.
test_cases.name: Get Todo with Optional Fields Null

test_setup.given: A todo with id=2 exists with only the required title field.
test_setup.then: Returns todo with nulls for omitted optional fields.

test_cases.description: Attempt to retrieve a todo using an ID that does not exist. Should return 404.
test_cases.name: Get Todo with Nonexistent ID

test_setup.then: Returns 404 with error message.

test_cases.description: Attempt to retrieve a todo using a non-integer ID. Should return a 422 or 400 error.
test_cases.name: Get Todo with Invalid ID Format

test_setup.given: The API expects an integer for todo_id.
test_setup.then: Returns 422 (Unprocessable Entity) with error message.

test_cases.description: Attempt to retrieve a todo using the smallest valid integer ID (e.g., 1).
test_cases.name: Get Todo with Minimum Possible ID

test_setup.then: Returns the todo with id=1.

test_cases.description: Attempt to retrieve a todo using a very large integer ID (e.g., 2147483647). Should return 404 if not found.
test_cases.name: Get Todo with Maximum Integer ID

test_setup.then: Returns 404 with error message.

test_cases.description: Attempt to retrieve a todo with id=0. Should return 404 if not found.
test_cases.name: Get Todo with ID Zero

test_setup.then: Returns 404 with error message.

test_cases.description: Attempt to retrieve a todo using a negative ID. Should return 404 or input validation error.
test_cases.name: Get Todo with Negative ID

test_setup.then: Returns 404 with error message.

test_cases.description: Retrieve a todo that was created with only the required title field.
test_cases.name: Get Todo with Only Required Field

test_setup.given: A todo with id=3 exists with only the title field set.
test_setup.then: Returns the todo with nulls for optional fields.

test_cases.description: Retrieve a todo with expiry_date set to a valid boundary date (e.g., '1900-01-01').
test_cases.name: Get Todo with Expiry Date Edge Case

test_setup.given: A todo with id=4 exists with expiry_date='1900-01-01'.
test_setup.then: Returns the todo with a valid boundary expiry_date.

test_cases.description: Creates a todo item with only the required title field.
test_cases.name: Create todo with only required title

test_setup.then: Todo is created with id and optional fields null.

test_cases.description: Creates a todo with title, description, notes, and a valid expiry_date.
test_cases.name: Create todo with all fields provided

test_setup.then: Todo is created and returned with all fields.

test_cases.description: Attempts to create a todo without a title, expecting an error.
test_cases.name: Create todo with missing title

test_setup.then: Error 400 with message for missing title.

test_cases.description: Attempts to create a todo with empty title string, expecting an error.
test_cases.name: Create todo with empty title

test_setup.then: Error 400 for empty title.

test_cases.description: Attempts to create a todo with an expiry_date not matching 'YYYY-MM-DD'.
test_cases.name: Create todo with invalid expiry_date format

test_setup.then: Error 400 for invalid date format.

test_cases.description: Creates a todo with expiry_date '1900-01-01', a valid boundary value.
test_cases.name: Create todo with expiry_date at boundary (valid)

test_setup.then: Todo is created with expiry_date '1900-01-01'.

test_cases.description: Attempts to create a todo with expiry_date '999-01-01', expecting an error.
test_cases.name: Create todo with expiry_date year not four digits

test_setup.then: Error 400 for invalid expiry_date format.

test_cases.description: Creates a todo with a title of 255 characters.
test_cases.name: Create todo with max length title

test_setup.then: Todo is created if title length is accepted.
test_setup.when: POST /todos with a very long title.

test_cases.description: Retrieves the list of all existing todos.
test_cases.name: List all todos

test_setup.then: Returns all todo items as stored.

test_cases.description: Fetches a single todo by its valid id.
test_cases.name: Get todo by valid id

test_setup.then: Returns todo record for id=1.

test_cases.description: Attempts to fetch a todo by an id that does not exist.
test_cases.name: Get todo by non-existent id

test_setup.then: Returns 404 error.

test_cases.description: Updates only the title of an existing todo.
test_cases.name: Update todo title only

test_setup.then: Title updated, other fields unchanged.

test_cases.description: Updates all fields of an existing todo.
test_cases.name: Update todo with all fields

test_setup.then: All fields updated.

test_cases.description: Attempts to update expiry_date with an invalid format.
test_cases.name: Update todo with invalid expiry_date format

test_setup.then: Error 400 for invalid date format.

test_cases.description: Attempts to update a todo that does not exist.
test_cases.name: Update todo by non-existent id

test_setup.then: Returns 404 error.

test_cases.description: Deletes a todo by its valid id.
test_cases.name: Delete todo by valid id

test_setup.then: Todo is deleted and not accessible.

test_cases.description: Attempts to delete a todo that does not exist.
test_cases.name: Delete todo by non-existent id

test_setup.then: Returns 404 error.

test_cases.description: Creates a todo with description set explicitly to null.
test_cases.name: Create todo with description as null

test_setup.then: Todo is created with description null.

test_cases.description: Creates a todo with notes set as empty string.
test_cases.name: Create todo with notes as empty string

test_setup.then: Todo is created with notes empty string.

test_cases.description: Attempts to create a todo with expiry_date '2024-AB-CD', expecting error.
test_cases.name: Create todo with expiry_date containing letters

test_setup.then: Error 400 for invalid date format.

test_cases.description: Updates all mutable fields of an existing todo with valid data.
test_cases.name: Update all fields of an existing todo

test_setup.given: A todo with id=1 exists in the database.
test_setup.then: The todo is updated with the new values and returned in the response.
test_setup.when: A PUT request is sent to /todos/1 with all fields updated.

test_cases.description: Updates only title and notes fields of an existing todo, leaving others unchanged.
test_cases.name: Update partial fields of an existing todo

test_setup.given: A todo with id=2 exists with title 'Original', description 'Original Description', notes 'Original Notes', expiry_date '2026-01-01'.
test_setup.then: Only the provided fields are updated; other fields remain unchanged.
test_setup.when: A PUT request is sent to /todos/2 with only title and notes fields.

test_cases.description: Sends an empty JSON body to update endpoint; expects no changes and the original todo returned.
test_cases.name: Update with no fields (empty object)

test_setup.given: A todo with id=3 exists with title 'Original Title', description 'Original Description', notes null, expiry_date null.
test_setup.then: No fields are updated and the current todo is returned.
test_setup.when: A PUT request is sent to /todos/3 with an empty JSON object.

test_cases.description: Attempts to update a todo with an id that does not exist; expects 404 Not Found.
test_cases.name: Update a non-existent todo

test_setup.then: A 404 Not Found error is returned.
test_setup.when: A PUT request is sent to /todos/9999.

test_cases.description: Attempts to update expiry_date with an invalid format; expects validation error.
test_cases.name: Update with invalid expiry_date format

test_setup.then: A 400 Bad Request error is returned for invalid expiry_date format.
test_setup.when: A PUT request is sent to /todos/4 with expiry_date='30-12-2025'.

test_cases.description: Attempts to update the title to an empty string; expects validation error.
test_cases.name: Update title to empty string

test_setup.then: A 400 Bad Request error is returned for empty title.
test_setup.when: A PUT request is sent to /todos/5 with title=''.

test_cases.description: Removes expiry_date by setting it to null.
test_cases.name: Update to remove expiry_date

test_setup.given: A todo with id=6 exists with expiry_date='2027-09-28'.
test_setup.then: expiry_date field is cleared (set to null).
test_setup.when: A PUT request is sent to /todos/6 with expiry_date set to null.

test_cases.description: Updates the title to a string of maximum allowed length, e.g., 255 characters.
test_cases.name: Update title to maximum allowed length

test_setup.given: A todo with id=7 exists with title='Desc'.
test_setup.then: The todo's title is updated to the new value.
test_setup.when: A PUT request is sent to /todos/7 with title at maximum length.

test_cases.description: Updates expiry_date to a date in the past; valid as per the API, should succeed.
test_cases.name: Update expiry_date to a past date

test_setup.given: A todo with id=8 exists with expiry_date=null.
test_setup.then: expiry_date is updated to the past date.
test_setup.when: A PUT request is sent to /todos/8 with expiry_date='2000-01-01'.

test_cases.description: Updates description without providing a title; should succeed (title is not required on update).
test_cases.name: Update with title omitted

test_setup.given: A todo with id=9 exists with title='Existing Title', description='Should change', notes='Some notes'.
test_setup.then: Description is updated, other fields are unchanged.
test_setup.when: A PUT request is sent to /todos/9 with description only.

test_cases.description: Updates the notes field to an empty string (should be accepted).
test_cases.name: Update notes to empty string

test_setup.given: A todo with id=10 exists with notes='Some note'.
test_setup.then: notes is updated to empty string.
test_setup.when: A PUT request is sent to /todos/10 with notes as empty string.

test_cases.description: Attempts to update expiry_date with an ISO 8601 date-time string (should fail).
test_cases.name: Update expiry_date with time component

test_setup.then: A 400 Bad Request error is returned for invalid expiry_date format.
test_setup.when: A PUT request is sent to /todos/11 with expiry_date including time.

test_cases.description: Deletes a todo by specifying a valid ID. The todo is removed and subsequent GET requests for the same ID return 404.
test_cases.name: Delete existing todo by valid ID

test_setup.given: A todo with ID 1 exists in the system.
test_setup.then: The todo is deleted. GET /todos/1 returns 404. The todo is not listed in GET /todos.

test_cases.description: Attempts to delete a todo that does not exist. The API should return a 404 error.
test_cases.name: Delete non-existent todo returns 404

test_setup.then: 404 Not Found is returned. No todos are deleted.

test_cases.description: Attempts to delete a todo using a non-integer ID. The API should return a 404 or validation error.
test_cases.name: Delete todo with invalid string ID returns 404

test_setup.given: No todo with ID 'abc' exists (invalid format).
test_setup.then: 404 Not Found or validation error is returned. No todos are deleted.

test_cases.description: Deletes a todo with ID 1, the lowest possible positive integer ID.
test_cases.name: Delete todo with minimum valid ID (1)

test_setup.then: The todo is deleted. GET /todos/1 returns 404.

test_cases.description: Attempts to delete a todo with a very large ID. If the todo does not exist, returns 404.
test_cases.name: Delete todo with maximum integer ID

test_setup.then: 404 Not Found is returned.

test_cases.description: Attempts to delete a todo which was already deleted. Should return 404.
test_cases.name: Delete already deleted todo returns 404

test_setup.given: A todo with ID 2 existed but was deleted previously.
test_setup.then: 404 Not Found is returned.

test_cases.description: DELETE request without Content-Type header. As body is empty, should still process correctly.
test_cases.name: Delete todo without Content-Type header

test_setup.then: The todo is deleted. GET /todos/3 returns 404.
test_setup.when: DELETE /todos/3 is called without Content-Type header.

test_cases.description: Sends a JSON body with the DELETE request, which should be ignored. Deletion still succeeds.
test_cases.name: Delete todo with unnecessary JSON body (should ignore body)

test_setup.then: The todo is deleted. GET /todos/4 returns 404.
test_setup.when: DELETE /todos/4 is called with a JSON body.

test_cases.description: Deletes a todo, then recreates a todo with the same title. Ensures delete fully removes the original.
test_cases.name: Delete todo and recreate with same title

test_setup.given: A todo with ID 5 exists with title 'Test'.
test_setup.then: The new todo is created with a new ID. GET /todos/5 returns 404.
test_setup.when: DELETE /todos/5 is called, then POST /todos with {"title": "Test"}.

test_cases.description: Attempts to delete a todo with an ID like '00001'. Should be interpreted as ID 1.
test_cases.name: Delete todo with ID having leading zeros

test_setup.then: The todo is deleted. GET /todos/1 returns 404.
